text: Herbert Albrecht (18 January 1925 - 3 November 1997) was a German wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1997 deaths Category:German male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United Team of Germany Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Suhl
title: Herbert Albrecht (wrestler)
